Title: Home
ConnectCameraDesc:
FullBowody is compatible with any camera that can be connected to a computer. This includes webcams, DSLRs, and even Kinect sensors.
You can also use your phone as a wireless camera by installing the FullBowody app on it.
TrackBodyDesc:
Start tracking your entire body in realtime with FullBowody's powerful tracking system.
And visualize your body moving in realtime thanks to the preview window.
LinkFullbowody: Link FullBowody to any game or software
LinkFullbowodyDesc:
FullBowody has a complete extension system that allows you to link it to any game or software that supports it.
This allows you to share the tracking data from FullBowody with any other application.
PlayEverything: Play or record everything you want
PlayEverythingDesc: Now that everything is setup correctly, you use FullBowody to play games with your friends or record animations for your next project!
